Name: Globorotalia crassa
Remark: another synonym of G. crassaformis, created for avoid duplicate name in sorting out data

Name: Globigerinoides tenellus
Remark: spinose without symbionts (Aze et al., 2011); closely related to G. elongatus and G. conglobatus, (Morard et al., 2019)

Name: Beella digitata
Remark: not sure as subthermocline, Coxall et al 2007

Name: Hastigerinella digitata
Remark: sister species of H.pelagica; symbiosis sees Takagi et al. (2019)

Name: Globoturborotalita tenella
Remark: Synonyms: Globigerinoides tenellus; Ancestor: G. rubescens

Name: Streptochilus globigerus
Remark: very rare, we do not know much about this one
